00064                 };

00099                         std::string id, login, dom_id, country, city;
00100                         std::string birthday, area_id, work_id, edu_id;
00101                         std::string sex_id, locale;
00102                         std::vector<std::string> ints_id;
00103                         std::string re_que, re_ans;
00104                 };

00109                 };
